attributes.action: Make the NHS stop heating places in hospitals unnecessary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I visited the out patient eye clinic at my local hospital this week. There were about 80-100 people in the waiting room. It was very stuffy and could made some people feel ill. Then I noticed the radiators were on full blast. There was no valve for anyone to adjust it. Fortunately, the windows could be opened.

I was having a chat with a fellow patient and he told me that they still have the heating on full blast during hot summer days.

There is no need to heat up places in hospitals where many people are sitting together.

Plus from what they could save in money could pay for some operations!
